document.full_text: about 34,000 southern sudanese have fled their homes after tribal clashes over land, water and cattle in recent weeks, a u.n. humanitarian official said, adding to southern troubles before independence in july.
document.title: about 34,000 people flee south sudan tribal clashes: u.n.
lines_and_colors: about 34,000 southern sudanese have fled their homes after tribal clashes over land, water and cattle in recent weeks, a u.n. humanitarian official said, adding to southern troubles before independence in july.
